title: Hacktoberfest 2022
description: Hacktoberfest is a month-long celebration of open source software run by DigitalOcean in partnership with GitHub and Twilio. Hacktoberfest is open to everyone in our global community!

title: MLH Fellowship 2022
description: A fully remote, 12-week internship where participants earn a stipend and learn to collaborate on real open source projects with peers and engineers from top companies.

title: Outreachy 2023
description: The Outreachy program is a really great program for students that aims to support diversity in open source and open science. Outreachy provides internships to people subject to systemic bias and impacted by underrepresentation in the technical industry where they are living.
end_date: Application will open in early February-2023 and will end in late February-2023

title: Microsoft Ignite
description: Latest innovations, learn, level up your skillset and create connections frm around the world. October 12 – 14 at 9:00 AM PDT

title: .NET Conf
description: Free three-day .NET virtual developer conference with major releases of the .NET Development platform. November 8 – 10 at 8:00 AM PDT

title: Google Season of Docs
description: Through Season of Docs, Google awards grants to open source projects and organizations to hire technical writers to work on documentation projects.

title: WebConf Latam
description: SINCE 2018 we are organizing this development-oriented conference web, with the idea that lecturers from Spanish speaking can expose about new technologies and transmit their community experience. Starting November 18.

title: Web Summit
description: Politico said we run “the world’s premier tech conference”, the Atlantic that Web Summit is “where the future goes to be born”, and Reuters that we assemble “the biggest names in tech and business”.

title: SÃO PAULO TECH WEEK
description: Through a fully dynamic event, SPTW will be 100% online and will bring a totally innovative approach, where each member will be able to generate qualified connections for their business not only during the lecture week, but also throughout the year.

title: EXPOTEC
description: Considered the largest technology showcase in the Northeast region, Expotec - Technology Fair and Congress is going to its 8th edition this year. With the theme 'Free, neutral and global Internet', the event will be held from November 23 to 25, at the João Pessoa Convention Center, with the support of the Internet Management Committee in Brazil (CGI.br/NIC.br) .

title: NDC London
description: Since its start-up in Oslo 2008, the Norwegian Developers Conference (NDC) quickly became one of Europe`s largest conferences for .NET & Agile development. Today NDC Conferences are 5-day events with 2 days of pre-conference workshops and 3 days of conference sessions.

title: ICSDMD 2023: 17. International Conference on System Development Methodology and Design
description: The International Research Conference is a federated organization dedicated to bringing together a significant number of diverse scholarly events for presentation within the conference program. Events will run over a span of time during the conference depending on the number and length of the presentations. With its high quality, it provides an exceptional value for students, academics and industry researchers.

title: TestJS Summit
description: TestJS Summit is an online event for QAs and software developers to get up to date with JS testing best practices, sharpen skills and get latest updates from top products core teams.
